date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
review: This phone is one of the best cheap phones that costed under $40 for me, the battery life is astonishingly amazing for such a cheap price and same goes for the display as well. It even gives off that flagship feel and look even though it is a budget phone. Even the camera is surprisingly well with 3 on the back for a wide view and 32GB of storage to hold my video in. The casing on it can withstand 1 meter drops onto a hard surface without any damage to it on every side. Seemless navigation with with gestures and buttons and motion with transition effects are always smooth including the One UI Home launcher. A few additional apps offered during setup from both TracFone and Google Play Store per usual but keep in mind some random games and social apps like TikTok and SnapChat will randomly install itself after you connect it to Wi-Fi during the setup process even after the setup is complete which takes up a whole gigabyte of storage but you can uninstall these apps right afterward (Facebook is pre-installed into the system so you can only disable that). However keep in mind right afterward you finish the setup of the device, update it to android 12 before putting any data on it because it might get stuck and you'd have to factory reset it to do the setup all over again, after that everything is good just do the setup again and remove the apps that install themselves and you're good to go. Another downside is that some notable standard features such as sound customizations like amplifier and equalizer are missing from the settings as well as screen recorder/screenshot tools are also missing from the quick panel even though those are also supposed to come standard with all One UI devices. I can't seem to find Good Lock in the Galaxy Store and Sound Assistant doesn't work right without the sound equalizer feature. I understand it has no Bixby features since this is a budget device and not a regular mid range A series or flagship, but some of the essentials I like using on my other One UI devices aren't there or are supported. However in the end this device has amazing hardware for the cheap price and the functionality can really be amazing for what you'll get out of a budget phone. -Kai Edward Bannon, Android technology expert
review_title: Great cheap phone, but be careful when upgrading to android 12, battery can last all week.

product_details:
ASIN B07DJW3M5R
Customer Reviews 4.5
4,149 ratings
4.5 out of 5 stars
Best Sellers Rank #8,925 in Arts, Crafts & Sewing (See Top 100 in Arts, Crafts & Sewing)
#160 in Paint Pens & Markers
Date First Available June 5, 2018
date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
review:
I like the variety of colors and uses on multiple surfaces, but what I did not like was when the black one I was using seemed to be coming to an end (not sure how long they’re supposed to last but I’ve been using it to do quick and simple borderlines) so I put the cap back on and put it in the container it came in upside down, hoping the acrylic would start making its way towards that end. Well less than 5 minutes later I go to take it out, and the cap is dripping, soaked with acrylic paint and leaking out into the container and onto the other markers. I took it out and removed the cap and dabbed it off quite a few times (as you can see in the photo) but that didn’t seem to be enough. I turned the cap around and put it in my mouth (so the part that snaps the marker shut was hanging out) and started to blow through it. And as you can see from the picture it was basically like spray painting.

Moral of this story, store upright after you use it or else you’ll have a mess on your hands! Also wouldn’t hurt for this company to put that direction on the outside of the container as a warning or caution statement. 🤷🏼‍♂️

ASIN B00125KXGI
Customer Reviews 4.6

#1 in Pencil Sharpeners
Date First Available April 18, 2006
date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
review:
I like that you can easily 'feel' when the pencil is fully sharpened; instead of continuing to waste the pencil, because you can't easily detect that the sharpener has achieved a finish.
Better than the (also cheap) Exacto unit it replaced. The Exacto unit (once to often) tended to break off the tip, and get it stuck in the unit; requiring disassembly, to remove the stuck point. This last time it happened, I simply tossed the Exacto unit out.
My first one arrived DOA, however. Wouldn't work, at all. I didn't measure the wall wart's voltage output, to determine if IT was the issue, or the sharpener, itself - just sent it back for an Amazon 30-day no-hassle Warranty Replacement.
Replacement unit works fine. Go figure.
Recommended.
review_title: Better than other, cheap elec sharpeners.

Item Weight 3.07 pounds
Manufacturer Plaid Enterprises, Inc.
Country of Origin USA
Date First Available October 11, 2017
date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
review: I use these paints to paint rocks. It was my first time ever painting rocks so I didn't know what products to buy. I am very happy with this purchase! I used this acrylic paint for the background and larger details on my rocks and then used acrylic markers for the writing. This pack of paint is a perfect starter pack. It has a great variety of colors. I have used every single one of them. You can also mix them to create even more colors. I've been playing around with it and I've been able to make some pretty cool sunsets and swirly effects (see pics/video). The colors are just as advertised. After a couple thin layers, the paint appears on the rocks the same exact color as the paint is in the bottle. I've noticed for the lighter colors (yellow and orange mostly), it's best to do a base coat of white first. If not, you'll end up using a lot more paint to get the color to stand out like as you'd expect. I've painted over 100 rocks (some a few times when i wasn't happy with the design i made) and every bottle still has plenty of paint. My lowest bottles are still over half full. A little paint goes a long way. The paint dries fairly fast to. Don't have to wait long between coats. I typically waited like 5-20 mins depending how thick of a coat was used and how intricate of a design i made. I haven't had any issues with the paint drying out or anything in the bottle which is great. I do make sure to shake the bottle for a second before using though. If you're going to use this paint for rocks, make sure you use a sealant after you paint so the rain doesn't wash away your designs! Overall, Great paints! 5 stars! 😁

date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
review:
I tried out the Caliart Pastel Acrylic Paint Set with 12 Brushes, and I must say, I really enjoy the colors. Big fan of pastel colors.

Vibrant Pastel Colors:
The first thing that caught my eye was the array of pastel colors in this set. They are rich, vibrant, and create such a lovely soft effect on my paintings. Whether I'm working on landscapes or portraits, these colors add a unique touch to my artwork.

Decent Brush Selection:
The 12 brushes included in this set cover the basics quite well. While they might not be the most high-end brushes I've used, they still get the job done. They are easy to handle and have allowed me to experiment with different techniques.

Versatility of Acrylics:
These acrylic paints are quite versatile. They work wonderfully on a variety of surfaces, including canvas, paper, and even wood. The consistency is just right, allowing for both thick impasto textures and smooth, delicate strokes.

Blend ability and Layering:
I was impressed by how well these pastel acrylics blend together and how easy it is to layer them. It gives me more control over the colors and allows me to achieve the desired shades and tones effortlessly.

Fast Drying Time:
As someone who tends to be a bit impatient, I appreciate the fast-drying time of these acrylics. It means I can work on multiple layers without waiting too long, which is perfect for keeping the creative flow going.

Good Coverage:
The opacity of these pastel acrylics is surprisingly good. With just a few strokes, I can achieve solid coverage, making it efficient and cost-effective in the long run.

Great for Beginners and Hobbyists:
For someone like me, who enjoys art as a hobby, this paint set is an absolute delight. It's reasonably priced and offers an excellent selection of colors and brushes for beginners or artists looking to explore pastel acrylics.

Final Verdict:
In conclusion, the Caliart Pastel Acrylic Paint Set with 12 Brushes is a wonderful addition to any artist's collection. The range of pastel colors, blend ability, and versatility make it a joy to work with. While it may not be a high-end professional set, it's perfect for hobbyists and beginners who want to create beautiful artworks without breaking the bank. I highly recommend it, and I'd give it a solid 4.5/5

review:
I thought I'd give these acrylic painting pens a try. Because with pens...you actually have more control over what you want to paint. At first... I wasn't convinced that they would be of great of quality. They kind of remind me of the watercolor pens. But once I started using them, and saw the color concentration... I was really impressed with them!

I concur with some of the other reviews when it comes to the metallic pens. A couple of them aren't that strong. These pens actually do remind me a watercolors, instead of acrylics. The acrylic pens give you more precision over what your painting.

The set gives you enough variety of colors to have just about any color you need to paint with. I'm still working with the combinations of different colors to come up with unique shades. But overall... I'm very happy with these acrylic painting pens.

review:
This review is for the following item: EinMAIQi 30 Colors Brush Tip Acrylic Paint Pens Paint Markers, Water Based Acrylic Paint Pens For Rock Painting, Wood, Canvas, Stone, Glass, Ceramic Surfaces, DIY Crafts Making Art Supplies

These are very nice paint pens that I purchased for my husband to use on his 3d prints to accent different areas, such as lips or eyelashes and nails. The paint covers well and even using a light color over a darker base, it only took 2 coats, which he expected.

The downfall of these paint pens is the tip does not give him as fine of a point that he needs for eyelashes. His other acrylic paint pens have a very fine point and these do not. That is why I deducted the one star.

I feel the price is very fair and I would recommend these paint pens.

product_name: EinMAIQi Paint Pens Paint Markers, 30 Colors Brush Tip Acrylic paint Pens for Rock Painting, Wood, Stones, Glass, Ceramic, Fabric, DIY Crafts Drawing Art Supplies, Quick Dry, Waterproof
product_details:

Customer Reviews 4.6
30 ratings
4.6 out of 5 stars
Best Sellers Rank #28,526 in Arts, Crafts & Sewing (See Top 100 in Arts, Crafts & Sewing)
#314 in Paint Pens & Markers
Date First Available June 1, 2023
date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
review:
I have high hopes that this set of pens will last for a while. I have had some poor luck in the past with acrylic paint pens that have dried up before their time. So far, after many uses, the pens in this set are still flowing easily and applying fresh colorful paint to canvases, wood and stone.

These 30 pens come neatly boxed and packed as 3 sets of 10 pens each attached to a sliver of cardboard. This makes the colors easy to find and keeps the storage as neat as a pin.

As opposed to many acrylic pen sets, these pens need no priming to be ready. You can pick a color and be ready to go right out of the box.

The colors are bright and cover in one brush. Our young art student (6 years old) had a favorite stone that she turned into a colorful ladybug in less than 10 minutes and it was dry to the touch in just a few moments after she was done.

The product promises easy application to many surfaces, including glass, ceramic, porcelain, wood, canvas, metal, plastic, stone, paper and more. We’ve used them quite successfully on canvas, stone, and paper and are eagerly looking to try other surfaces.

The pens are stated to be non-toxic and they are definitely odorless. As with any artistic medium, I would always suggest parental supervision for the first few times a younger child may be using these.

For those with an unsteady hand with a brush, these pens are great for adding details to paintings. They are also very useful for party decorations and invitation cards.

Slightly more expensive than most sets of acrylic paint pens but the price is more than sufficiently offset by the 30% optional Amazon coupon (at the time of this review), making this set very affordable and attractive for children, adults, beginners, experimental and advanced artists.
review_title: Very useful acrylic pens that are ready to use without priming!

Using different colors for different tasks or categories was suggested to help me stay organized as I complete my college studies as a working adult. Having a family and a lot going on most days during the week, it was helpful to color code my tasks, reminders, and schedule to look at daily. The pens should be covered at all times when not in use to prevent them from drying out.

date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
review: I was afraid these pens were going to write too thinly, but they're a very good thickness. The ink is smooth and not clumpy and the colors are very nice and true. They do not bleed through my planner pages and they don't glop all over the page. Excellent fineliners. My only complaint is that the plastic holder doesn't have enough of a structure to it to hold the pens in place when you remove one. The rest kind of fall over and fill in the gap where the missing pen should go and you have to readjust them to fit the pen back in. If there was more definition to the inside of the package that would be great.

product_details:

Item Weight 0.8 ounces
Country of Origin China

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer No
Release date December 14, 2021
Language English
Department unisex-child
Manufacturer Melissa & Doug
date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
review:
Years ago, I got a toy almost exactly like this for some friends when their baby turned one. They told me later it was the best toy they had received. It's quiet, it's washable, and it captivates their toddler.

They said they moved it from room to room with them, for example, tying it to a doorknob so their son could be engaged while they were busy fixing dinner or hanging out in the kitchen.

I recall it was the 'toy of the year' by a parenting magazine that rates toys, and I can see why.

I got this one recently for a neighbor's one-year-old. I'm not sure it's the original, but it sure is close, and they love it. They tell me it took a while for their son to 'get it,' but once he did, he played well, feeding the pelican and watching what happens. They say it's supporting the 'cause and effect' stage of his learning.

Manufacturer Melissa & Doug
date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2016
review:
This toy is neat and unique. My youngest (15 months old) is a huge fan of hiding things or taking them and seeing where they fit. It must be a developmental milestone because I'm always finding sippy cups of milk and food in very odd places. She is delighted with that game but I just can't share in the enthusiasm when I lose the game and find what she hid a few days later. Anyway, I was looking for a toy with a similar cause and effect concept to keep her entertained and we got this. She really likes it and I haven't found (or smelled) any disgusting food surprises lately so it must be working.

The description says that it's 5 inches high but that's actually the height of the sea creatures. The pelikan itself is approximately 20 inches.

What I don't like:

There are just four toys to feed the pelikan. I feel that the price ($24.99 when we purchased) was rather high for what you actually receive. The quality and stitching is excellent, like all M&D toys we buy, but we like a little variety! :)

One other thing that's rather annoying is that there is no structure inside of it so it slumps over. Having a weighted belly with some reinforcement in between the material on the sides would probably make this toy easier for little hands to play with.

Overall though, it's a pretty cool toy and the kids like it.
review_title: Love the concept but structure needs improvement

4.6 out of 5 stars
Release date October 1, 2021
Manufacturer Fisher-Price
date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2016
review:
Absolutely love this ball! I'm not sure what other reviewers were expecting. Yes, it plays songs and counts repetitively that may be annoying to some adults, but it what makes your child smile and that's why I'm giving it 5 stars. This has become my child's favorite go to toy which we got for her 1st birthday. She love it so much that she has it all day to when she goes to sleep at night to traveling in the car.
During the day she tosses it around and sits it with her when she watches TV. In car rides it's been even better because it's the one toy that can't easily gets tossed to the side where no one can get to it. My child loves playing throw away with hopes it bounces back now. She immediately smiles when she sees it and loves hearing the sounds it makes.
I'm of the mindset that as a parent you should reinforce learning with your child so even though it counts numbers and sings songs, I'm not sure it will mean anything to your LO unless you sing along or copy the noises. So again, consider your expectations when purchasing this toy. The sound can easily be turned off or sound lowered and it's also machine washable when you take the electronic insert out. Another plus for me when my LO had an accident throw up on it. Keep in mind also that this is made of cloth material and not the soccer type of material - so don't expect it to bounce or be kicked around like that. But it does roll and can be tossed around with baby.
review_title: Love. Became little one's favorite toy.

date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 13, 2023
review: Absolutely love this bag. It does exactly what the video shows. Loads of space. I love the design on the front as my son is autistic and wears headphones so this logo/print was perfect. It holds all of his stuff for the day and also stuff for his night group and also his nova chat talker as well as food and clothes and extras. He’s had it a few weeks now and he is in and out of cars and school bus and outings with his group and there is minimal scratching up to now. Material and zips are fine. The bag is flexible to fold. This is a school/care bag for me but I recommend it to anyone who needs a reliable bag. Also love the smaller bag that comes with it that too is good quality. I haven’t tried the charge port yet but this too as an extra for charging is great for my son as he always needs something charged. Overall I love this bag and would recommend to anyone who has to carry a lot of stuff on a regular basis. Perfect for the outdoors too. I will buy another one next year.

date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in France on August 31, 2023
review:
Bien évidemment si l'on considère les conditions de travail dans lesquelles sont conçus ses articles par des gens qui n'ont pas notre confort matériel de vie, on comprend volontier que des défauts de manufactures puissent survenir... mais peut-être pas plus souvent que chez des marques de renom.
En sortie d'emballage le produit est juste magnifique!! , le yeux de l'enfant pétillent, et la prise en main confirme son apparente solidité et confort de confection.
Matelassé au possible, spacieux et bien pensé, il offre une alternative très honorable et qui n'a rien à envier aux gandes marques ou aux produits labélisés par des clubs ou équipes dont vous payez pour la licence putôt que la réelle qualité de conception.
Sans comparaison avec le poids des affaires d'un collégien, il conviendra sans aucun doute à l'emport d'un élève de primaire...
Un rapport qualité prix indéniable!

review: I have not had the pleasure of traveling with this just yet, but I will say this - this is a very well made, attractive, roomy, travel back pack with plenty of compartments! I am surprised at how much it expands, and how much it holds! It seems very durable and very well made. I really like that you can un-clip the sides to make more room. I bumped into someone in my apartment complex - small world - not too long ago, and she had the same exact one. She also loved it and could not say enough good things about it. She was just returning from a trip and said it’s her favorite thing to travel with. I’m very much looking forward to traveling with mine! Oh one thing I almost forgot to mention - the pack itself is nice and light weight, especially for how durable it looks to be, which I really appreciate. More weight to be able to put into it without having to worry that the pack itself will add too much to the airline’s restrictions. Beyond worth the price. Very much recommended!!

date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
review:
I packed this backpack to the point of bulging and it worked perfectly.

—What I Like:
The quality of material seems decent for the price at the time of this review. I’m impressed with the sewing of the seams as well as the reinforced stitches on the handle and straps.

For my last trip, I packed this thing super full, and my laptop is heavier than most. The backpack was so heavy that the weight of it actually started hurting my shoulders after an hour of waiting in line at airport security and a trek to the gate. The straps are very padded and comfortable, so the pain wasn’t from the backpack itself, but rather because I got so crazy with the contents. Without the padded straps, I would have been miserable.

Even with the weight, I never worried about the straps separating from the bag because it’s clear the sewing is quality.

I totally dig how many different pockets there are, especially the pocket that’s plastic-lined for “wet” items. I used it for the wet-wipes, since the “resealable” package never quite reseals like it’s supposed to.

I had been looking for a large bag that would fit under the airplane seat, and this one did. (See picture #1.)

I also packed my memory foam travel pillow inside of the largest compartment (part of why the bag bulged), and my pillow isn’t exactly small. (See picture #2.)

The laptop compartment is padded in a way that’s comparable with all other laptop bags I’ve owned.

—What Can Be Improved:
I would have liked a little more space in the laptop compartment because it was a tight fit with the cord, the adapter, and my mouse.

I really love that it fits under the plane seat, but there was still room for more bag—even packed to the hilt—and I could have used that on my last trip. (See picture #1 if you haven’t already.)

—Functionality: Wonderful

—Longevity: I’m not sure about this. I guess it depends on how much you’re gonna abuse it. Mine will get a lot of hard use. If it falls apart in the few months, I’ll revise my review.

—To Buy or Not to Buy: If you’re looking for something that’s decent quality for the price (at the time of this review), this bag is perfect. Love it.

date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
review:
I haven't yet used this bag for its intended purpose, but plan to on my next flight. This backpack can work as Carry On Luggage based off of the way it was designed but I plan to use it as my personal item instead of carrying a purse, that way I can hold more things.

Aesthetically the backpack is a very lovely shade of blue and the material feels smooth and a little silky on the outside. It feels like it should be durable enough to handle travel, but I won't be able to actually say that it's good for travel until after I use it for that purpose.

I really like that it has handles on the top and side so that you can easily maneuver it around. There's also a zippered area at the top of the back straps so that if you don't want the back straps dangling around, and you want to use it more like an actual luggage bag, you can tuck the back straps into the zippered pocket for a sleeker look.

There are plenty of pockets and compartments which I always love in my bags. You can unzip the main part of the bag all the way so that the bag can lie open and flat like luggage so that you can easily get to your belongings. I wish that the laptop area also did this so that you could easily unzip it for TSA and lie it flat for scanning, but I guess you can just temporarily put your laptop in the main compartment, and then after TSA check, just put it back into the laptop compartment.

In the main compartment it comes with elastic straps to keep your belongings in place like a typical luggage bag would have. On the other side it has 2 large zippered pockets, one is a wet pocket the other is mesh.

I really like that there's a hole on the side of the bag meant for wires to go through. You can thread your portable charger cable through this, and on the inside there's a little pocket meant to hold the charger in place which is nice.

As a bonus, you get a little toiletries bag that comes with it, which isn't anything special but it's nice to have another bag just in case.

Without having yet used it, it seems like it'll be a good travel backpack.
review_title: Nice looking backpack and carry on luggage all in one!

review:
I recently acquired the Nintendo Switch™ with Neon Blue and Neon Red Joy‑Con, and I am thrilled to share my overwhelmingly positive experience with this versatile gaming console. The Nintendo Switch™ offers a truly unique and captivating gaming experience that has exceeded my expectations. Here's my detailed review of the Nintendo Switch™ with Neon Blue and Neon Red Joy‑Con:

Versatility and Portability:
The Nintendo Switch™ is a master of versatility, seamlessly transitioning between handheld, tabletop, and TV modes. Whether I'm gaming on the go, sharing the joy with friends, or immersing myself in the stunning visuals on the big screen, the Switch™ effortlessly adapts to my gaming preferences. The lightweight and compact design, combined with the detachable Joy-Con controllers, make it a breeze to carry and enjoy gaming wherever I go.

Innovative Joy-Con Controllers:
The Neon Blue and Neon Red Joy-Con controllers are not only eye-catching but also a testament to Nintendo's innovation. These detachable controllers provide an immersive and intuitive gaming experience, allowing me to play with traditional button inputs, motion controls, and even HD rumble feedback. The Joy-Con controllers offer a level of precision and responsiveness that enhances gameplay across a variety of genres.

Expansive Game Library:
The Nintendo Switch™ boasts an ever-expanding game library that caters to gamers of all ages and preferences. From iconic Nintendo franchises like Super Mario, The Legend of Zelda, and Pokémon to an array of indie and third-party titles, the console offers a vast selection of games that guarantee countless hours of entertainment. The ability to play both exclusive Nintendo titles and popular multi-platform games makes the Switch™ a true gaming powerhouse.

Seamless Multiplayer Experience:
The Nintendo Switch™ embraces the joy of gaming together, thanks to its seamless multiplayer capabilities. Whether through local wireless play or online multiplayer, the console encourages social gaming and fosters friendly competition. The detachable Joy-Con controllers allow for instant multiplayer experiences, making it easy to share the excitement with friends and family.

Superior Display and Graphics:
The Switch™ boasts a vibrant and high-definition display that brings games to life with stunning visuals. Whether I'm exploring vast open worlds, solving puzzles, or engaging in action-packed battles, the graphics never fail to impress. The console's ability to deliver a visually rich gaming experience, both in handheld and docked modes, showcases Nintendo's commitment to quality and immersion.

Nintendo's Signature Charm:
Nintendo has a knack for infusing its consoles with a sense of charm and whimsy, and the Nintendo Switch™ is no exception. From its user-friendly interface and delightful sound effects to the iconic characters and beloved franchises, the console exudes Nintendo's unique identity. The attention to detail and the overall gaming experience make it a joy to own and play.

Nintendo Switch™ with Neon Blue and Neon Red Joy‑Con is a gaming marvel that seamlessly combines versatility, innovation, and a captivating game library. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to gaming, this console offers an experience that will keep you entertained for hours on end. The sleek design, immersive gameplay features, and Nintendo's signature charm make the Switch™ a must-have for any gaming enthusiast.

(Don't forget to explore the Nintendo eShop for downloadable games, demos, and additional content to further enhance your gaming experience.)

date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
review: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas, along with a screen protector, a case, an SD card and a few games. She was so excited and loved it because this is the first portable gaming system I have bought her, aside from the Oculus Quest II that I got her a few Christmases ago. For the price, it’s definitely worth it. Everything seems to be around the $200 range when buying portable gaming systems. The size is great. The graphics are great. All the different accessory bundles that you can buy to go with it are great. The fact that you can play it on the tv or with other people who have a switch is great. The fact that you can buy the games digitally vs. cartridge is also great so that you don’t have to worry about losing the cartridges and storing them. I only wish the games were cheaper. At upwards of $50+/game I won’t likely be buying her new games except for her birthday and Christmas but I suppose that’s to be expected, especially with new and popular games. I just feel like if you’re getting a digital version of the game, it should be much cheaper than buying the actual cartridge game. I do like that you can get Nintendo gift cards to buy the games though. Definitely 10/10 recommend if you can afford it.

date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
review:
The only reason I bought these is because I like playing video games with headphones and much to my chagrin the Xbox doesn't support any old BT headphones (why, I have no idea, this seems like just a ploy to sell accessories or licensing fees and I'm not even joking when I say if I had known I would not have purchased an Xbox), which I have Beats Studio 3's that have worked just fine for my needs until now.

I looked at ways to avoid buying new headphones, but I then discovered that the Beats do not support wired audio (plugging into the controller), and all of the BT transmitter options did seem somewhat cheaper, but at best inferior if not even workable. The only ones I found on Amazon that seemed to have a prayer of working are around $50 and it seemed like a good gamble on whether or not they wouldn't just feel like a $50 band-aid to a problem.

I looked at dozens of headphone options and I was surprised that the official Xbox set was the cheapest pair that seemed to show up on tons of lists for best options on the internet. I even read an Amazon review by someone who said something snooty about how if Beats and Bose are your idea of quality then these are for you. Well, they are my idea of quality. I know there are lots of other way more expensive options out there but I am no sound engineer and like I said always thought my Beats were just fine.

So, I ordered them up and received them today. The person was 100% correct though, and these work great for my use. I do not online game so mic quality did not matter to me but I suspect it's probably fine. The construction is better than decent I think for the price and the sound quality in my opinion is just as good as my Beats, which cost over twice the price. The noise canceling isn't as good but this is not really an issue for me at home. They are very comfortable and I've played around 3 hours with them so far and there has been no discomfort as of yet.

The only negatives I have found so far is the accessories app. On my laptop it doesn't recognize that there are any headphones connected when I'm literally using them with my laptop and on the console there is no way to have it open the EQ while a game is playing audio so you can tune it while the sound is running. I found several "tutorials" that say to just select the headphone icon from the Home screen when they connect; I don't know what Xbox console these people are using but there is no way to select this icon on mine. So, you have to either guess or find a profile online to copy, set it, and hope for the best (still just a guess really).

They are a bit bass heavy out of the box but nothing terrible and it completely fixable with almost no effort. The few reviews I read that claim these are "complete garbage" are ridiculous, which you can basically tell when they sum up with something like "In the end I decided to keep them because......". Also, to the people who complain about them being cheap because they picked them up from the mic and it broke off; what is wrong with you people? The mic is not a handle. They are not designed to be carried that way. You can tell by looking at it that you could quite literally snap it off by doing this. Not to say that it is cheap, but it's not like they're military grade or anything. If you are doing this and they break then you broke them. It is not bad quality or design. If this is an issue for you then buy more expensive headphones.

If you are just looking for a decent pair of headphones that aren't actual garbage but not ridiculously priced these are a very good if not the best option. I hate promoting anything Microsoft, but i'd be lying if I said otherwise.

***Update***
I just figured I would add that I am seeing around 14 - 16 hrs of use between charges. That is with listening to game audio and music or movie audio from a laptop while gaming. No online gaming using the mic.

***2nd Update***
I am taking a star off because I cannot make phone calls using these headphones. I successfully made 1 call but I forgot I had turned my mic off in it's configuration (Ok, my fault) and the other person couldn't hear me. So, I turn that on, try making a call and my phone says that it is paired but the call is not using BT or the headset. I then make another call with a different headset and that works just fine. I then try another call with the xbox headset and again it says they are connected but the call is not using the headset and is on the phone speaker. I try to disconnect the headset, it says that it's disconnected, go back a page in my phone menu and it still shows up as a connected device. I select the headset to open it on my phone and it says there that it is disconnected. I try to forget the headset, nothing happens. Try again and nothing happens. I restart my phone. The headset is now no longer a saved device. Pair it again, and the whole thing starts all over. When I pair it to my phone, it pairs, but when I make a call it does not connect to the headset. After this It sill show in two different menu screens as connected and disconnected and the forget device does not work. I have to reboot my phone. I would think this is an issue with my phone but it's a newer Android Pixel and none of my other BT devices do this. I also tried setting the headset back to original settings and turning it on and off and re-pairing. Nothing works.

Right before posting this I tried the following just to be sure. Restored default settings on the headset again, checked for updates (none available), turned off the headset, turned off my console, got the headset removed from the BT device list on my phone, restarted everything, paired the headset back onto my phone, made a call, this time the phone made the call through the headset but still the other person could not hear me. The mic was on and all sensitivity options were at medium. As far as I can tell either it just doesn't really work to make phone calls or the settings require some ridiculous amount of configuring. This should work with the default settings, or if you need to do something special it should clearly tell you what to do.

I also thought to try turning the auto-mute all the way off (it is on low) but now I would have to turn off the headset, forget it from my phone, reboot my phone, restart the headset and pair it for the umpteenth time to my phone. This should not be so difficult and am giving up.

***Third update***
Took off another star (I can't even fathom how happy I was with these for the first 3 days) because the game audio is ridiculously unstable. It's constantly too loud or too quiet. Sometimes adjusting the volume with the cups is either too strong or seems to do nothing. I have to adjust the settings and the volume on the cups every 5 minutes. And last night I discovered this wonderful echo. At one point it made using the Xbox unusable. All of the system sounds were firing 3 or 4 times, the NPC voices were just garbage. It would be one thing if I could find accurate settings to leave it on, but whenever I get it working when I fast travel (I'm playing Starfield right now) or enter a building or something it's like the audio just loses its mind and I have to spend time trying to get it working again. At this point I cannot recommend this headset at all. It is a waste of money for me now and I will be replacing them if I cannot return them. Unfortunately, I've thrown the box away and I am not sure what else even came with it. Was there a USB cable? I have so many I just throw them in a bag when I get a new device that comes with one.

date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
review:
So, I'm not an avid gamer by any means. I recently got an Xbox Series S and it came with the wired headset, but I kept getting the wire all wrapped around my hand or I would pull it out while trying to put my controller down and go into the other room. It got very annoying very fast. I did research on headsets for a couple weeks. I didn't want to spend unnecessary money on an expensive pair that I wasn't actually happy with or had features I really didn't need.

The main features I was looking for in a headset were: wireless, simultaneous Bluetooth and mic monitoring. Nothing fancy at all. I have to say it was incredibly hard to find more than a few headsets that had simultaneous Bluetooth connection so that I could listen to music or take phone calls while I was also gaming and hearing the audio from that. When I saw these did it, I was really excited and thought it was a better option than shelling out more money for some higher tier headsets like the SS Arctis 9X or TBs. I read too many mixed reviews about those, where the negatives were just too worrisome for me to really consider getting them. I did see mixed reviews for these, but I took the risk since they are not as expensive and I figured I'll just try to be extra gentle when handling them.

So far, these are definitely what I needed and wanted! The simultaneous Bluetooth is a huge win for me. A friend of mine doesn't have a headset, so we just talk on a phone call while we game, but I'm absolutely still able to hear the audio from whatever game I'm playing. There's also an in-game chat mixer built in, just rotate the outer part of the left ear cup to adjust as needed. Volume adjusting is the right side ear cup.

The ear cups feel very comfortable. It's some type of memory foam. I haven't noticed any sort of discomfort unless I play for 6+ hours straight and that happens rarely and I really only think that's due to the fact that I wear glasses. The head band also is comfortable for the most part. I would say that I do start to notice a bit of discomfort after a few hours. I don't really mind this, as I usually just slightly adjust it forward or back or my head once in a while. Not a big deal for me, though.

The only thing I don't really like is the placement of the microphone mute button... all the way on the back of left ear cup on the mic piece. It's not on the mic itself, but the arm of it, which also could be a bit longer in my opinion. Sometimes I worry I'm not close enough to it for it to clearly pick up my voice, but luckily the mic monitoring does help me to know how loud or quiet I am and if the other people can hear me.

Altogether I'm very happy with these and I'll try to give an update to my review after 6+ months of use.

review: This is the best headset for Xbox that I have ever owned, hands down. Not only is it wireless and works flawlessly with the Xbox Series X, it can even be paired with your phone via Bluetooth. I love the over-the-ear fit, and the ingenuity behind the design of this thing is apparent. To adjust the volume, simply rotate the right earcup until you reach the desired level. Rotating the left earcup changes the sound levels between game noise and chat. It also has an attached microphone for communication. Regarding the appearance, it has a nice sleek Xbox design that gamers should love. The sound quality is awesome. I have used this quite a bit for gaming, and I have no complaints. My dog even tore off one of the ear cushions, but I was able to easily get it put back in place. I would recommend this wireless headset to anyone who's using an Xbox One or Series X/S.

Auch sitzt der Kontroller sehr locker und instabil in der Station. Wenn man wie ich Katzen hat und die mal ein bisschen den Kontroller berühren, ist er schief und lädt nicht mehr.
Das hätte man ganz einfach mit einer ergonomischeren Führung machen können, so das der Kontroller besser rein rutscht und arritiert ist.
Auch das der Stecker des Netzteils hinten gerade und nicht abgewinkelt ist, ist in meinem Fall ein Nachteil, weil ich die Ladestation somit nicht direkt an die Wand stellen kann. Meine Alte Ladestation für die PS4 hatte das besser gelöst.
Für diese 2 Handlingsprobleme 1 Stern abzug. Wie gut sich die Ladestation im Langzeittest schlagen wird, muss sich noch zeigen.

product_name: PlayStation VR2 (PSVR2)
product_details:
Package Dimensions 17 x 10.25 x 7.5 inches
Item Weight 5.14 pounds
ASIN B0C1QJ6VHY
Batteries 1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)
Customer Reviews 4.3
302 ratings
4.3 out of 5 stars
Best Sellers Rank #1,048 in Video Games (See Top 100 in Video Games)
#3 in PlayStation VR Headsets
Date First Available May 1, 2023
Manufacturer Sony
Language English
Country of Origin China
date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
review:
As someone who regrets not purchasing the PSVR1 for the PS4, I would say yes. If you don't own a PS5, it's not worth going out and purchasing a PS5 and a PSVR2. The PSVR2 in my opinion is more advanced than the Meta 2 and the picture quality is superior.
Questions you should ask yourself if you're considering a PSVR2. Do you play your PS5 a lot? Do you have friends that can meet you for a private match? My answer was yes to both of these questions. Every Friday night, 5 of us get together and play mini golf, and it's almost as if we're all on vacation together. The transition from playing a PS5 game to playing a PSVR2 game is seamless. There is a button on the front bottom right of the headset that you can press to bring back your real life surroundings. This is HUGE!
Do you enjoy streaming? Streaming is simple with the PSVR2. You don't need any capture cards etc. It's pretty simple to be honest once you set everything up which may take a good half hour.
Is the wire that connects to the PS5 an issue? If it is you should wait for the Meta 3. I've only had one issue almost tripping on the cord while boxing in the Creed boxing game.
Do you have the space? Truly, if you have a 3.5 foot space in every direction, you'll be compressed, but you'll also be fine because you can move with your thumbsticks. I play C-Smash (racquetball) against friends, stand in one place and use the thumbsticks to move left and right. It works fine.
Check out the catalog on the Playstation Store before making a final decision.

product_name: PlayStation VR2 (PSVR2)
product_details:
Package Dimensions 17 x 10.25 x 7.5 inches
Item Weight 5.14 pounds
ASIN B0C1QJ6VHY
Batteries 1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)
Customer Reviews 4.3
302 ratings
4.3 out of 5 stars
Best Sellers Rank #1,048 in Video Games (See Top 100 in Video Games)
#3 in PlayStation VR Headsets
Date First Available May 1, 2023
Manufacturer Sony
Language English
Country of Origin China
date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
review:
Note: just like the few people here my vr headset’s seal of the box was also broken. Nothing was missing though. I found out others had the same issue and it was because sony repackaged the PS VR2 bundle with a Horizon VR code. So instead of manufacturing more PS VR2s, they took the already existing ones made, broke open the seal, insert the code, and close it back up without resealing it.

Now that’s out of the way the setup is wayyyy easier than the first PSVR. Instead of having a clunky box you gotta wire, everything is plugged in with one cord to the PS5. To me the setup was seamless. It ask you to do the following things on the screen. Having a confirm button built into the headset was a nice touch, instead of having to press confirm off a ps5 controller. Once once everything was said and done it was a breeze. The fact that there is a physical adjustment knob to change the distance between your eyes is a game changing compared to the software adjustment from the psvr1 and oculus quest 2. Played some RE8 VR and it looks amazing! Here’s hoping they have more games coming out.

One annoying thing is there is no official pc support. I understand this is a Sony product and their best interest is to make people buy their games off of their store, but for a niche entertainment medium like VR, the industry won’t survive in the long round unless they group up together with PC VR and Oculus Quest.
review_title: Seal was broken. But there’s a reason why

date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
review: I have recently received the steam deck, and it is bulky. I brought the steam machine after some research. I discover that you cannot find any other handheld with similar or better performances for affordable prices. For example, the Aya Neo offers better performance and graphical fidelity than the steam deck. However, the prices of these competitors with superior hardware are two times the prices of the steam deck base model, which is only $399! I prefer the 399 models, but since I was in a rush, I brought the most premium variant of the steam deck, which is 650 bucks when you buy it from steam. So if you are purchasing the steam deck, I recommend the base model because the only good thing about the most expensive model is additional accessories and a bigger Micro SD. Plus, you will save money and buy your SD to save even more.
review_title: Cannot find anything better for the price

date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
review: I have recently received the steam deck, and it is bulky. I brought the steam machine after some research. I discover that you cannot find any other handheld with similar or better performances for affordable prices. For example, the Aya Neo offers better performance and graphical fidelity than the steam deck. However, the prices of these competitors with superior hardware are two times the prices of the steam deck base model, which is only $399! I prefer the 399 models, but since I was in a rush, I brought the most premium variant of the steam deck, which is 650 bucks when you buy it from steam. So if you are purchasing the steam deck, I recommend the base model because the only good thing about the most expensive model is additional accessories and a bigger Micro SD. Plus, you will save money and buy your SD to save even more.
review_title: Cannot find anything better for the price

review: I bough this wheel for American Truck Simulator (and European Truck Simulator, but I’m not there yet). product_name: logitech G920 Dual-motor Feedback Driving Force USB Racing Wheel with Responsive Pedals for Xbox One (Renewed)
product_details:
Customer Reviews 4.3
560 ratings
4.3 out of 5 stars
Best Sellers Rank #163 in Amazon Renewed (See Top 100 in Amazon Renewed)
#3 in Xbox One Game Racing Wheels
#237 in Climate Pledge Friendly: Computers
date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2021
review:
Let’s start with the positives:
This is a fantastic entry-level product that takes your gaming / sim racing experience to the next level.
Nice materials used for most of the components.
Usability for PC and Xbox One.

Reason for 3 star rating:
Common shifter paddle issues! My upshift paddle has stopped working about 2 years into ownership - ruins the experience and Logitech does not offer repair. Online resources tells me its fixable by tinkering with microswitch and re-soldering it to the board. I will give this a try, but really speaks poorly of Logitech in terms of reliability, build quality, product design and customer care.
Update: Fixed the issue by disassembling the wheel to get to the shifter microswitch. Removed the small cover to expose the contact pads. Used a fine 2000 grit sandpaper to carefully clean the contact pads. Reassembled and back to fully operational. Keeping the 3-star rating because this is not something I expected to do for a $400 product at 2 years of ownership.

Other smaller negatives:
You are not able to connect a headset to it.
The cables are not replaceable (except for power cable), so be careful. Brake one, you’re looking at a new rig.
The steering wheel diameter is very small, making it feel less realistic - there are aftermarket solutions to this, but nothing straight forward.
review_title: A really great product... But reliability could be better

#237 in Climate Pledge Friendly: Computers
date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in Canada on July 7, 2023
review:
Purchased refurbished. Have done so with various items; have had 2 items unsatisfactory and Amazon return policy is excellent.

This a decent wheel/pedal combination. Feels like higher quality than the price paid even if not to the same standard as a direct drive (with a much more serious investment $$ req'd).

Desk mounting doesn't seem to be as secure as my old (very old!) Logitech steering wheel was.

The brake, as many You-Tube reviews have pointed out, is EXTREMELY stiff and lacks "feel." There are several mods/fixes for this ranging from a couple dollars up to about $100 that I would consider a must do.

Other than that, I would say that this is quite good value especially at a refurbished (in my case it is virtually brand new) price.

review: Me encantó, ciertamente he conseguido otros dos enfriadores para complementar, pero este por su cuenta ya debe ser indispensable para enfriar la consola, pues ciertamente ayuda a extraer el aire caliente del interior. Ojo, no esperes que el aparato no se sienta caliente al tacto o se comporte como un refrigerador, pero dios, la diferencia de temperatura se nota de forma considerable. (Ah si, retiren la tapa para mejores resultados, yo la dejé para la foto porque admitamoslo, se ve perron)

review: Die Architektur ist für meine Zwecke super, da ich rauche aber mein technisches Gerät nicht vollmocken möchte. Aber auch Hausstaub welcher sonst in abgestelltem Zustand von oben in die Xbox rieseln würde sollte durch das "Dach" aufgehalten werden. Nur dass das Gerät nicht erkennt wann die Xbox abschaltet sondern immer weiter läuft bis man es manuell abstellt ist eine Farce. Das sollte noch justierbar sein, dann gibt's auch den letzten Stern.

product_name: essence | Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara | Gluten & Cruelty Free
date_and_country_pf_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
review:
I recently tried the False Lash Effect Mascara, and I must say, it's been a game-changer for my lashes. Not only is it gluten and cruelty-free, which aligns with my values, but it also delivers fantastic results.

One of the standout features of this mascara is its ability to provide a false lash effect without the need for actual false lashes. With just a few coats, my lashes looked dramatically longer, thicker, and more voluminous. It truly enhances the natural beauty of my eyes.

I also appreciate that this mascara is easy to apply. The brush is well-designed, separating each lash and preventing clumps. I can achieve a beautifully defined look with minimal effort.

As someone with sensitive eyes, I'm delighted that this mascara doesn't irritate or flake throughout the day. It stays put, maintaining its stunning effect from morning to night.

Knowing that this mascara is gluten and cruelty-free makes me feel good about my purchase. It's a high-quality product that aligns with my ethical preferences.

In conclusion, if you're in search of a mascara that can give you a false lash effect without the fuss of actual false lashes, the False Lash Effect Mascara is an excellent choice. It's both gentle and effective, making your eyes pop with captivating lashes. I highly recommend it!
